version_description: • Better, faster and safer Internet with one-touch setup •

What's New
* You can now enable a "Dark Theme" from settings.
* We added better support for accessibility controls.
* The app now supports the following additional languages: Armenian, Russian and Czech.

Bug Fixes
* We made the app more reliable by adding granular support of IPv4/IPv6 networks.
* We fixed an issue on iOS 10.3 where users could not go back to the settings menu.
* Fixed connection status detection.
* Other minor bug fixes.

• We now explain how the 1.1.1.1 app works under the hood (before you add the VPN profile).
• We made some changes that will make the 1.1.1.1 app consume less battery than before.
• We fixed a crash that happened to some users when switching networks.

New in this release:
• The app now supports 3D touch.
• You can now add a 1.1.1.1 app widget that will show if your DNS queries are private and secure.

Fixes & Improvements:
• The app now prevents ISPs from hijacking domains that do not exist.
• We made some changes to how we manage UDP sessions to increase the stability of the app.
• The app now does not turn off the 'On Demand' feature when there is no Internet connection.

New in this release:
• You can now pause the 1.1.1.1 app.

Fixes & Improvements:
• Improved battery life.
• Better status detection for the widget.
• The home screen is more informative when the network changes.
• Improved detection of NXDomain hijack by ISPs.
• Other minor bugfixes.

New in this release:
• You can now pause the 1.1.1.1 app.
• Incompatible network detection.

Fixes & Improvements:
• Improved battery life.
• Better status detection for the widget.
• The home screen is more informative when the network changes.
• Improved detection of NXDomain hijack by ISPs.
• Other minor bugfixes.

New in this release:
• You can now pause the 1.1.1.1 app.
• Incompatible network detection.

• Better status detection for the widget.

• Improved detection of NXDomain hijack by ISPs.
• Other minor bugfixes.

New in this release:
• You can now pause the 1.1.1.1 app.
• Incompatible network detection.

Fixes & Improvements:
• Improved battery life.
• Better status detection for the widget.
• The home screen is more informative when the network changes.
• Improved detection of NXDomain hijack by ISPs.
• Brought back missing onboarding titles.
• Other minor bugfixes.

New in this release:
• You can now pause the 1.1.1.1 app for the current Wi-Fi network. 1.1.1.1 will unpause when you connect to a different network.
• You can delete the VPN profile from settings. It will reinstall the VPN profile when you re-enable 1.1.1.1.

Fixes & Improvements:
• Shows a countdown of remaining seconds before the app unpauses.
• Improved reachability to our resolver.
• Other minor bug-fixes.

New in this release:
• You can now add 'Trusted Networks' from the Advanced settings menu. Adding a Wi-Fi network to your list of Trusted Networks will pause 1.1.1.1 when you are on that Wi-Fi network.

Fixes & Improvements:
• We fixed a crash that was happening with a few users when they were using 1.1.1.1 on iPads.
• Other minor bug-fixes.

New in this release:
• You can now add 'Trusted Networks' from the Advanced settings menu. Adding a Wi-Fi network to your list of Trusted Networks will pause 1.1.1.1 when you are on that Wi-Fi network.

Fixes & Improvements:
• We fixed a crash that was happening with a few users when they were using 1.1.1.1 on iPads.
• Other minor bug-fixes.

New in this release:
• You can now add 'Trusted Networks' from the Advanced settings menu. Adding a Wi-Fi network to your list of Trusted Networks will pause 1.1.1.1 when you are on that Wi-Fi network.

Fixes & Improvements:
• We fixed a crash that was happening with a few users when they were using 1.1.1.1 on iPads.
• Other minor bug-fixes.

New in 4.2:
• UI refinements and bug fixes

New in 3.13
• Continue to add improvements for connection loop issues, performance, and increased battery life.
• UI improvements



Previous improvements:
• "Switch to DNS only mode" when disabling WARP
• Fixes for false positive captive portal detection
• Compatible issues with iOS 10 resolved
• Improvements for battery usage
• Additional Warp performance and stability fixes

The wait for 1.1.1.1 with WARP is over.

New in this release:
• 1.1.1.1 with WARP replaces the connection between your phone and the Internet with a modern, optimized, protocol.
• 1.1.1.1 and WARP are free, but WARP+ is a paid feature which can be enabled at any time.
• WARP+ uses our proprietary Argo technology to specially route all requests to avoid Internet traffic jams. On average Argo makes web assets 30% faster.
• You can get free WARP+ data by sharing 1.1.1.1 with friends.

Updated Privacy Policy: https://www.cloudflare.com/application/privacypolicy/
Updated Terms of Service: https://www.cloudflare.com/application/terms/

• Fixes for 1.1.1.1 mode
• Fixes for false positive captive portal detection
• Compatible issues with iOS 10 resolved
• Improvements for battery usage
• Additional Warp performance and stability fixes

Fixes & Improvements:
• Fixes for Rogers network
• Fixes related to frequent connection restart
• Improved Battery performance

New in this release:
• You can now add 'Trusted Networks' from the Advanced settings menu. Adding a Wi-Fi network to your list of Trusted Networks will pause 1.1.1.1 when you are on that Wi-Fi network.

Fixes & Improvements:
• You can now remove the current Trusted Network from the main screen.
• We fixed a crash that was happening with a few users when they were using 1.1.1.1 on iPads.
• Other minor bug-fixes.

This is an exciting release!
Over the next few months, we will be rolling out a new way to make your mobile Internet faster: Warp.
Warp is a technology which gives a speed and privacy boost to all of your Internet traffic.
We added notification permissions so that we can let you know when Warp is available.
Join the waitlist now to secure your spot!

This is an exciting release!
Over the next few months, we will be rolling out a new way to make your mobile Internet faster: Warp.
Warp is a technology which gives a speed and privacy boost to all of your Internet traffic.
We added notification permissions so that we can let you know when Warp is available.
Join the waitlist now to secure your spot!

In addition we have fixed several bugs that will provide stability and more battery performance.

4.0 is a major version release which fixes many of the biggest issues with 1.1.1.1 and WARP! 

New in 4.0:
• When WARP couldn’t connect some users were experiencing a connecting/disconnecting ‘loop’. This update dramatically reduces the incidence of those issues. If you couldn’t connect to WARP before, you probably can now!
• Significant performance improvements which also improve battery consumption.
• New installs will now default to WARP. Users will always have the option to switch back to using 1.1.1.1 alone, and existing user’s preferences will always be respected.
• DNS queries while using WARP will default to using DNS over WARP, rather than DNS-over-HTTPS or DNS-over-TLS. WARP is just as secure as those protocols, but can be faster.
• WARP now works on older devices running iOS 10
• Careful UI polish and UX improvements

New in 4.1:
• UI refinements and big fixes
• Battery improvements
• Compatibility fixes for iOS 10

Performance and Connectivity Improvements.
Performance and Connectivity Improvements.
Performance and connectivity improvements
Performance and connectivity improvements
Performance, connectivity, and battery improvements
New account feature that allows you to share your settings across devices.

- You can now protect your device from malware, phishing, crypto-mining and other security threats using 1.1.1.1 for Families. You can enable it by going to the DNS Settings inside the app.
- You can also use DNS filtering from Cloudflare Gateway using the 1.1.1.1 mobile app.

General bug and localization fixes to keep you safer and more secure on the Internet!

Note this will be the last release to support iOS 10. To continue receiving future updates, update to iOS 11 or newer.

General bug fixes and improvements including:
- iOS 14 won't automatically check clipboard referral promo code
- Improved diagnostics of connection issues

General bug fixes and improvements including:
- improved DNS compatibility
- fixed a rare crash that happened when a support ticket was being created

General bug fixes and improvements including:
• Minor UI fixes
• Fixed a crash impacting iOS 10 users

*Note: This is the final release that will support iOS 10

Our latest iOS client with new features, improvement and bug fixes to keep your connection fast and secure on the Internet. Some of the more notable improvements with this release:
• Added support for Cloudflare for Teams
• Improved connectivity to WARP
• Consistency improvements to match new macOS desktop application available on our website

Notable features and improvements in this release:

* Connectivity verifier to automatically check network connectivity after tunnel is connected.
* Display appropriate message if active devices limit exceeded when adding new license key.
* Fixed an issue where status shows disconnected after toggling main switch to ON.
* Few changes and bug fixes with onboarding flow.
* Changed UI logo and menu items for various Teams modes.

Our latest iOS client with improvements and bug fixes to keep your DNS fast and connection secure on the Internet.

Notable improvements:

* Improved Cloudflare for Teams login experience.
* Updated UI throughout the app.
* General bug fixes and improvements.

Our latest iOS client with improvements and bug fixes to keep your DNS fast and connection secure on the Internet.

Notable improvements:

* Enhanced feedback submission workflow.
* Support for new onboarding true/false mdm flag in Teams mode.
* Changed app icons to be consistent across the platforms.
* Exponential backoff when retrying failed API requests.
* Performance fixes and stability improvements.

Our latest iOS client to keep your DNS fast and connection secure on the Internet.

Notable changes:

* Minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

Our latest iOS client to keep your DNS fast and connection secure on the Internet.

Notable changes:

* Implemented Split tunnel UI to exclude IP and IP ranges from WARP tunnel.
* Implemented Fallback domains UI to resolve specified domain suffixes using system resolver.
* General bug fixes and stability improvements.
